summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting a proffer interview with Jeffrey Epstein's former cellmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC). The interview was conducted at the Southern District of New York on August 29, 2019, and the cellmate shared information about Epstein while they were housed together in the Special Housing Unit until August 9, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He was the cellmate of the interviewee in the Special Housing Unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center until August 9, 2019.

events.title: Proffer Interview of Epstein's Cellmate
events.description: A proffer interview was conducted with Jeffrey Epstein's former cellmate at the Southern District of New York office.

events.title: Epstein's Last Day with Cellmate
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was housed with the interviewee in the Special Housing Unit at MCC until this date.

locations: Southern District of New York (SDNY), 500 Pearl Street, New York, New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), Special Housing Unit (SHU), L Tier, Cell 220
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein had a cellmate in the Special Housing Unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center until August 9, 2019.
The FBI conducted a proffer interview with Epstein's former cellmate on August 29, 2019, at the SDNY office.
The cellmate was housed with Epstein in Cell 220 on L Tier of the SHU at MCC.
The document references attached notes from an earlier investigation on August 16, 2019.
The interview involved multiple law enforcement officials including an AUSA, FBI Special Agent, FBI Task Force Officer Detective, and an Office of Inspector General SA.
